name: Bid on Dungeon
description:
-Story-

It was unknown where this tendency came from, storing things in a dungeon became very common.
Many people bought land and built dungeons.
However...Is this because of design deficiency? This craze brought many troubles.
Now enormous money and valuables are stuck in those storage units.
Most dungeons were auctioned and many adventurers started to bid and explore to have a fortune.

-Key-
Z : Check, Attack
A : Use item
D : Guard

I made most of graphic resources and used RTP, DLC, royalty free assets and published plugins. (Please check Readme.txt file)
